4454.verse: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -

4455.verse: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -

4456.verse: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

4459.verse: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

4460.verse: Like the boiling of scalding water.

4461.verse: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,

4462.verse: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."

4463.verse: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!

4464.verse: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."

4465.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;

4467.verse: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

4468.verse: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

4469.verse: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.

4470.verse: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

4471.verse: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.

4472.verse: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.

4473.verse: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].
